name: Text.LineStyle
desc: Description of the style used to draw the line for StrikethroughStyleAttribute and UnderlineStyleAttribute.

items.name: struct Pattern
items.desc: The pattern, that the line has.

items.name: static func == (Text.LineStyle, Text.LineStyle) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two line styles are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two line styles are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the line style by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the line style.
